mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.OWNERID, t1.OWNERTYPE, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDICTID, t1.USERDICTNAME FROM T_SRFUSERDICT t1

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`OWNERID`, t1.`OWNERTYPE`, t1.`RESERVER`, t1.`RESERVER2`, t1.`RESERVER3`, t1.`RESERVER4`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`USERDICTID`, t1.`USERDICTNAME` FROM `T_SRFUSERDICT` t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.OWNERID, t1.OWNERTYPE, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDICTID, t1.USERDICTNAME FROM T_USERDICT t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.OWNERID AS OWNERID, t1.OWNERTYPE AS OWNERTYPE, t1.RESERVER AS RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2 AS RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3 AS RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4 AS RESERVER4, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDICTID AS USERDICTID, t1.USERDICTNAME AS USERDICTNAME FROM T_SRFUSERDICT t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.OWNERID AS OWNERID, t1.OWNERTYPE AS OWNERTYPE, t1.RESERVER AS RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2 AS RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3 AS RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4 AS RESERVER4, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDICTID AS USERDICTID, t1.USERDICTNAME AS USERDICTNAME FROM T_SRFUSERDICT t1

SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[MEMO], t1.[OWNERID], t1.[OWNERTYPE], t1.[RESERVER], t1.[RESERVER2], t1.[RESERVER3], t1.[RESERVER4], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[USERDICTID], t1.[USERDICTNAME] FROM [T_SRFUSERDICT] t1
